state_protection_analysis: Mexican authorities could provide protection to the applicant
reasonableness_standard: The standard of review for state protection cases is reasonableness
country_conditions: Mexico makes efforts to protect citizens, though local police were ineffective due to familial influence
decision_outcome: The RPD's decision was reasonable and supported by evidence; the judicial review application is dismissed
burden_of_proof: The claimant must prove no evidence supports the RPD's decision
evidence_assessment: Evidence showed Mexico makes efforts to protect citizens
